title: Welcome to the Playground!
body: We have updated the site to load news from a file! No more editing HTML.

title: New Command Learning Lab
body: Check out the new interactive Bash lesson in the terminal. Type 'learn-commands' to start.

title: Linux PLayground's official release!!
body: This is the full base release of Linux Playground. This includes packages such as I-installer, Terminal Tutor, and tool box.
